text: Viśvāsigaḷē, khaṇḍitavāgiyū dharmagurugaḷu mattu san'yāsigaḷalli heccinavaru janara sampattannu akrama vidhānagaḷinda kabaḷisuttāre mattu allāhana mārgadinda taḍeyuttāre. (Avarigū) cinna hāgū beḷḷiyannu allāhana mārgadalli kharcumāḍade avugaḷannu saṅgrahisiṭṭukoḷḷuvavarigū kaṭhiṇa śikṣeya śubhavārte nīḍiri
